summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2485, for the improvement of 39th Avenue South from Ferdinand Street to Rainier Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading an curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 27159 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
